hero.title: Senior Software Engineer
hero.description: Specializing in backend, frontend, and database development with over 7 years of experience. Expert in .NET, React, Angular, MSSQL. Passionate about building scalable solutions and improving customer experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Software Engineer with expertise in .NET, React, Angular, and databases. Experienced in Customer Experience Management (CXM), consulting, IoT, and HR software domains. Proven ability to lead teams, design APIs, and improve system performance. Passionate about learning and mentoring others.

boostCX.description: Developed CXM solutions, led API module design, led team of 2, collected client requirements.

infopulse.description: Built solutions for Big Four firm, refactored legacy code, wrote unit tests, participated in planning.

oitl.description: Developed IoT apps, optimized databases, configured CI/CD pipelines.

keepSolid.description: Improved product quality, optimized databases, covered legacy code with unit tests.
